thread.title: Srinivasan is the BCCI representative to ICC: Richardson
thread.title_full: Srinivasan is the BCCI representative to ICC: Richardson - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Srinivasan is the BCCI representative to ICC: Richardson
text:
MUMBAI: International Cricket Council CEO David Richardson says N Srinivasan at the ICC helms and Shashank Manohar being the BCCI president will not affect the relationship between the board and the world governing body.
Asked whether Srinivasan as ICC head and Manohar as BCCI chief will affect the relations between the two organisations, Richardson replied in negative.
"No at the moment Mr. Srinivasan is the BCCI representative to the ICC and we have no issues with that," the former South African player said on sidelines of a function.
Manohar was critical of Srinivasan during the IPL spot-fixing scandal and asked the Tamil Nadu strongman to step down from the post of then BCCI president.
